title: Keep the furs: Monoprice drops uber-affordable new home theater gear
text:
Keep the furs: Monoprice drops uber-affordable new home theater gear 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Monoprice does its Monoprice thing, offering a host of new home theater products at radically affordable pricing, including a hybrid tube am...
